price: I borite se na Allahovu putu protiv onih koji se bore protiv vas, ali ne prelazite granice. Zaista Allah ne voli one koji prekoračaju granice.
arabic: وَقَٰتِلُواْ فِي سَبِيلِ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّذِينَ يُقَٰتِلُونَكُمۡ وَلَا تَعۡتَدُوٓاْۚ إِنَّ ٱللَّهَ لَا يُحِبُّ ٱلۡمُعۡتَدِينَ

version.title: Bosnian translation - Rowwad Translation Center
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Bosnian by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: waqātilū fī sabīli al-lahi alladhīna yuqātilūnakum walā taʿtadū inna al-laha lā yuḥibbu al-muʿ'tadīna
